welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Chigwell, United Kingdom! Known for its picturesque landscapes and quaint charm, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport caters to the needs of VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Heathrow's newest and largest terminal, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the oldest terminals at Heathrow, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving mainly SkyTeam and non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal for British Airways and its partners.

wifi.note: Free for the first 45 minutes, then charges apply.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport mainly serves low-cost airlines such as Ryanair and easyJet.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting 'Rochester Airport WiFi' and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wethersfield Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
